lab.title: Building an App based on RESTful Services for Oracle Autonomous Cloud Service

modules.title: Module 1: Building your Table - Using Quick SQL
Module 2: Creating an app on the tables from Quick SQL - Using the Create Application Wizard
Module 3: Using the APEX_DATA_PARSER - Populating the Table
Module 4: Modifying the Interactive Report SQL - Improving the Report
Module 5: Updating the Report in the Runtime environment - Updating the Report View
Module 6: Adding a Chart for a single Country - Adding a Chart
Module 7: Updating chart attributes - Improving the Chart
Module 8: Adding a Page Item and List of Values - Adding a Country List
